original_text: And this shall be his uncleanness in his issue: whether his flesh run with his issue, or his flesh be stopped from his issue, it is his uncleanness.
korean_text: 그의 유출병으로 말미암아 부정함이 이러하니 곧 그의 몸에서 흘러 나오든지 그의 몸에서 흘러 나오는 것이 막혔든지 부정한즉

sentences.original_text: And this shall be his uncleanness in his issue:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것이 그의 유출로 인한 부정함이 될 것이다:

sentences.original_text: whether his flesh run with his issue,
or his flesh be stopped from his issue,
